author: Staff Reporter
text:
S. Maulidharan (19) of Bharathi Nagar near Padaivedu in Namakkal district, who was studying second year B.Sc. Computer Science in a private college at Peelamedu, was reportedly found hanging in his hostel room on Thursday. The Peelamedu police said that the hostel staff, who saw the room locked, opened it and found him dead. His body was taken to Coimbatore Medical College Hospital for post-mortem examination.

Dacoity

An unidentified man robbed a woman at Kuniyamuthur on Wednesday. The police said that Vahitha (34) of Minnagar in Kuniyamuthur was alone in her home when the door bell rang. She opened the door and the unidentified man with his face covered made his way in, tied her in a chair, got the keys of the almirah and decamped with around 54 g of gold jewellery and Rs. 45,000 in cash. Police sources said that the dacoity was similar to the one committed at Singanallur a couple of weeks ago.

Chain snatched

Two unidentified persons snatched an eight-and-a-half-sovereign gold chain from S. Ramathilagam (70) of Nehru Colony in Mahalingapuram near Pollachi on Thursday. The police said the woman was returning home when the duo snatched the chain and fled on their motorcycle.
title: Student found hanging in hostel
